32453.summary: Some customers in Grandin area of St. Albert are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32453.title: Jan 23 - St. Albert (Grandin) | Service Outage (Fix in Progress)
